theaters.name: Beach Landing - General Assault
theaters.description: You are the tip of the spear. Your mission is to break shoreline defenses and draw the bulk of the Iron Conclave's attention while other forces move into position.
primaryObjectives: Break shoreline defenses and push inland
Draw the bulk of the Iron Conclave's attention
Reach the road to the Coastal Keep

theaters.name: Beach Landing - Siege Train
theaters.description: You escort the siege engines that will crack the Coastal Keep. Without these weapons, the assault becomes a grinding war of attrition.
theaters.keyTension: Shorter route, heavier exposure. Losing siege equipment is catastrophic.
failureEffects: Keep becomes far harder to take
Act III shifts toward attrition or sabotage

theaters.name: Portals & Bridges
theaters.description: Teleported behind enemy lines, your mission is to secure critical bridges before enemy forces can destroy them or use them to reinforce the coast.
theaters.entryPoint: Teleportation to a resistance-held watchtower behind enemy lines.
primaryObjectives: Hold them long enough for Theaters 1 and 2
failureEffects: Reinforcements reach the Keep in greater numbers

theaters.name: Air Battle - Sky Control
theaters.description: The skies above the battlefield are contested. Enemy wyverns, gyrocopters, and war-mages threaten to turn the tide. You must stop them.
primaryObjectives: Defend ground forces from aerial threats
